day-off.activity: working on a Discord bot! Maybe I can have it run my errands for me!
day-off.outcome: I had an existential crisis instead. No more bots for me. ;~;

weekend.activity: going out to dinner with my 12 besties (delayed from last week, aheh). Hope I don't get too drunk -.-
weekend.outcome: I am never drinking again. ;~;

weekend.activity: going fishing with a friend I met online!
weekend.outcome: Turns out they were actually a dolphin the whole time. They're really good at fishing though! :D

weekend.activity: going to paint a beautiful picture! Maybe even two!
weekend.outcome: I did it! I'm a bit too embarrassed to post them though. >.<

weekend.activity: looking at pictures of cats on the internet! :3
weekend.outcome: I didn't sleep all weekend again, but whenever I close my eyes, all I see is cats.

weekend.activity: going to a buffet by myself. A PIZZA BUFFET. WITH ICECREAM. OM NOM NOM.
weekend.outcome: I learnt something important: just because you can, doesn't mean you should.

weekend.activity: going to learn how to write JavaScript! Finally I can be cool like you guys. :3
weekend.outcome: I learnt something important: just because you can, doesn't mean you should.

weekend.activity: going to the zoo! Lions and tigers and bears, omai!
weekend.outcome: THEY DIDN'T HAVE ANY BEARS I WAS SO SAD ;~; I had some beers afterwards though, aheh. ^^

weekend.activity: doing a dancing competition! I hope it goes well!
weekend.outcome: I won! I got a medal and everything! I'm going to wear it everywhere ~

weekend.activity: going camping in Alaska! So much packing to do! T.T
weekend.outcome: Aurora Borealis is sooooooo pretty. *.* I wish I could put it in my house!

weekend.activity: going... guys... I don't feel so good...
weekend.outcome: You can't have a friendly neighbourhood Dee without a Dee, right?

weekend.activity: going to investigate a noise under my house. Wish me luck! D:
weekend.outcome: I found a cat! Do I win a prize? :3

weekend.activity: watching paint dry. People keep talking about it, so it must be good, right? ^^
weekend.outcome: I think I did it wrong. That wasn't fun at all!

weekend.activity: doing meal prep. What should I eat? Wait, don't answer that, that's not very deep or meaningful!
weekend.outcome: Well, I did it! Now to figure out how to eat...

weekend.activity: playing a new game I bought! I wonder what Detroit is like? :o
weekend.outcome: Ahhh! Robots are SCARY! D:

weekend.activity: auditioning for a musical. I'm really nervous!
weekend.outcome: I got it! :D Now I know that anything can happen, if you take a chance!

weekend.activity: trying to make a bit of extra cash on the side.
weekend.outcome: By the way, today's question is sponsored by Audible, Loot Crate, Crunchyroll, Dollar Shave Club, and Orion Health.

weekend.activity: going to get SO fit. Legend of Dee: Ocarina of Gains, amirite?
weekend.outcome: My mum laughed at me for going on the treadmill. Oh well, watching a basketball anime counts as exercise, right?

weekend.activity: moving out! Take that mum! Who's laughing now?
weekend.outcome: Wow, I didn't realise how much stuff I owned until I tried to take it all on the bus. >.<'

weekend.activity: moving back in! Rent is expensive! ;~;
weekend.outcome: My mum laughed at me again. Oh well, you win some you lose some. T.T

weekend.activity: going to the beach. Sun, surf, sand! :D
weekend.outcome: It was very cold! Nobody told me it was winter outside!

weekend.activity: writing some fan fiction. Finally, all my years of fantasising are gonna pay dividends! ^^
weekend.outcome: Wow, writing is hard! Anyway, I'm sure the Avatar fandom are gonna love this OC!

weekend.activity: preparing a cosplay! So many parts! Avatar forever!
weekend.outcome: I bought a lot of blue body paint. Hopefully I don't make a mess. :3

weekend.activity: snuggling up with a blanket and some food. Can I borrow someone's fireplace? ;P
weekend.outcome: Being cozy is the best. I wonder if I can do this for a living! :>

weekend.activity: cleaning my room. Paper, paper everywhere! I can barely walk to my bed! What am I going to do? >w<'
weekend.outcome: Receipts and debts, drawings and scraps, love letters and death threats, my old D&D stuff... I can't throw any of this out! I won't! ;~;

weekend.activity: sleeping in! Zzzzz -w-
weekend.outcome: Maybe I'll take another nap... ;3

long-weekend.activity: crying about my friends ditching me - I'm gonna go hide in a cave and watch anime ;~;
long-weekend.outcome: Anime was fun - so much fun, I didn't sleep - but instead, Ì ̸ḥ̲͠a̕v͈͖̩̯̬e̻̥ ͇̥̕às҉͈c̹͉̣̩en҉̺̻d͓̳̹͚e̬̙͎͖͝d̶̠̟͓͚͔̙.̪̩͔͎̩̠ Hehe, just kidding!

long-weekend.activity: going to give the Queen her birthday present! I hope she likes it!
long-weekend.outcome: Turns out it wasn't her birthday after all! Whoops! All that money spent on plane tickets for nothing! >:3

long-weekend.activity: working. ;~; That's what you do on labour weekend, right?
long-weekend.outcome: Nobody was at work! I just watched anime instead! Hooray! o/
